title: Photo Of The Day: July 21, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: We know from personal experience that rollerderby is one of the hardest things to capture on film, but this shot by Chris Wage did a great job of catching a lot of the action and excitement of the event. contentEncoded:
We know from personal experience that rollerderby is one of the hardest things to capture on film, but this shot by Chris Wage did a great job of catching a lot of the action and excitement of the event. As much as we love this photo, rollerderby still one of those sports that’s way more fun in person–so your next chance to see them is on August 9th at the State Fairgrounds. Best of luck to our girls as they head off to Tampa this week to battle the Tampa Derby Darlins!

Photo of the Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry- We’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
